Title: US Govt Taking Stakes in Companies/Stock, who's next?
Author: u/surfnvb7
Score: 136 | Comments: 100 | Upvote Ratio: 94.0%
Created: 2025-10-07 22:04:11
Content: So we now have Trilogy Metals (TMQ), Lithium Americas (LAC), MP Metals (MP), Intel (INTC), and US Steel.  

Each time, the stocks have given huge pumps on the announcements.   

What do you think the intention is to buy stakes in these type of companies?  Revival?  Strategic reserve?

Who do you think is next?
